description.value:
When you scout, you are particularly alert for danger, granting your allies precious moments to prepare to fight.

When using the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Scout]{Scout} exploration activity, you grant your allies a +2 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls instead of a +1 circumstance bonus.
